name: Fruits Together
description:
How to play?

You control one character at a time (an avocado or a tomato), press space to change the character, and move using WASD.

The avocado and the tomato throw apples at each other, if an apple hit an enemy, he dies.

Have fun!

- My PB: 10 Tool used:

Game engine: Unity 2019.4.34f1

Pixelart editor: Piskel

IDE: Visual Studio 2019
